nodes.bodyText: would the sparkMaster and sparkMemory put into sparkProperties? and if so, what's the priority?

would the sparkMaster and sparkMemory put into sparkProperties? and if so, what's the priority?

Usually put the parameters that are less changeable in sparkProperties, master and memory usually specified every time when run.

this is a bug?

I think it is. When hasNext is true, we expect get the lastInstant, and when it's false (instants is null), expect 0.
